thread.title: These Men Are Stealing Their Girlfriends’ Headwraps As Payback For Women Taking Their Hoodies
thread.title_full: These Men Are Stealing Their Girlfriends’ Headwraps As Payback For Women Taking Their Hoodies

author: Veronica Wells
title: These Men Are Stealing Their Girlfriends’ Headwraps As Payback For Women Taking Their Hoodies
text:
It's no secret that women have a habit of taking their man's clothes. They're looser, more comfortable, and contain the scent of your beloved. Win-win-win. But apparently, men don't appreciate the thievery. And in retaliation, one man in particular, 22-year-old Marquis McNeil, stole something of hers in return. Last year, he started with her hoodies, jackets and sweatshirts. But this year, he upped the anti by stealing his girlfriend's wrap. He told BuzzFeed , "I didn't have my du-rag at the time and it's the next best thing if not better." Fellas I'm doing this for every hoodie ive ever lost to a female, we gotta start taking they shit in 2017. pic.twitter.com/KisZOj2HCx 
— Marquis. (@Mute_McNeil) March 19, 2017 And it wasn't long before other men follow suit. @Mute_McNeil we here pic.twitter.com/G3CM5Ft99U 
— Vietnamese Jesus (@VietnameseJC) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil Issa wrap pic.twitter.com/NIZfMqCUzt 
— Jesse Muchai (@iKinuthia_) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil you know what? You're absolutely right. ✊ pic.twitter.com/4Tb8Jle9A7 
— Irked & Exasperated (@TastefullyNasty) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil Let's soldier on fellas✊ pic.twitter.com/7IiSDpAfzo 
— Trash Boat (@siya_nerdychap) March 19, 2017 @siya_nerdychap @Mute_McNeil here with y'all, man pic.twitter.com/x2oYU7vyxU 
— #StopKurt2017 (@Arquipimp) March 19, 2017 By now, you have might have noticed something, these men have their headwrapping skills down, so much so that women were asking for a tutorial. In his interview with Buzzfeed, McNeil had an answer for that too. “As far as the tutorial goes I don’t think I will do one. There are already so many on YouTube and it’s only easy for us guys to make the different style wraps because we don’t have a lot of hair to get in the way,”   @Mute_McNeil pic.twitter.com/dP65rfRRbR 
— TheRealFlexGod (@DaFlexGod_) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil actual factual pic.twitter.com/iE8pdqFPiq 
— Ant B. (@AKingNamedANT) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil pic.twitter.com/DQBXpu6yyM 
— Deezy (@CampaignDeezy__) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil pic.twitter.com/DQBXpu6yyM 
— Deezy (@CampaignDeezy__) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil pullin' up like pic.twitter.com/nlFclRqWWJ 
— laurance (@laurancedawkins) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil pic.twitter.com/FXr6VEs5Ov 
— HEAD SCARF KILLA (@Duro_ARTS) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil she thought she was getting this back pic.twitter.com/WQ6UaZNQBi 
— Assata (@Suuuuttaa) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil ✊✊ pic.twitter.com/vxI0cL2QnN 
— ✈C.C.✈ (@Camm_Santana) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil : I'm here for the movement pic.twitter.com/E92RB4azhf 
— Chocolate & Carefree (@3_Two_Juan) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil Been at it. pic.twitter.com/PyowZ4Sotg 
— 08.03.2017 (@_Chronik) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil LETS GET THIS MOVEMENT GOING pic.twitter.com/RlMuhV3wKU 
— ⛈..CAM..⛈ (@WaffelTripper) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil you are so right bro pic.twitter.com/DBk3PE0lQI 
— Sunday Candy (@notsbstnrd) March 20, 2017 @Mute_McNeil We taking scarfs and bonnets in 2017 pic.twitter.com/BAkQ3AXv8s 
— UcheTheGreat ⚾ (@Kingwesley12) March 19, 2017 @Mute_McNeil bro, we been hip pic.twitter.com/4HZ2igZYBH 
— B-I-C-T-H (@oldirtyginger) March 19, 2017 I feel u Bruh @Mute_McNeil we gotta start taking their stuff. "Once this bonnet is on I'm in for the night" pic.twitter.com/mCxwsbiKAT 
— crawfishBae Lee (@KoolCreation) March 20, 2017 Straight comedy. Veronica Wells is the culture editor at MadameNoire.com. She is also the author of “Bettah Days.” You can follow her on Facebook and Twitter @VDubShrug.
